name: Glory or Death
description:
Some time ago I received a bizzare RFQ for PacMan like game, where player collects personal data, game is web based and has editable levels. I wanted to check if I can meet these requirements within 1 hour. I did, and here it is. 
Bare in mind that this project is simple and oppressive. It's either Glory or Death! 

Tips:

  • Collect all dots 
  • Use arrows to move
  • Avoid enemies
